Command-Line Interface
==========================================

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2


The command-line interface is accessed by typing ``tyaml`` after installing the package.


Render
-------

.. code-block:: bash

   tyaml render [PATH]

Renders the transformation of a path to STDOUT.

Version
-------

.. code-block:: bash

   tyaml version

Prints the version and compile time of the package.
